title: Game freezing, while joining and entering the game.
body:
Today i logged on to my LoL account, the first thing i did (Like i normally do) was to play a ranked game. Everything went fine. The client searched for a game for the normal 2/3 mins that it takes, and when i got in the game we selected our champions. 

And this is here the problem starts. The client closes down and opens the game, and i see the borders for the champions. The only problem was that there came no champion, and none of the players who should have loaded at least 30% by now. Showed up. 
So i did as i usually do when something remotely close to this error happens. I press (Alt+Esc) to exit the game so i can see if its a bug-splat. When the game closed down and i was on my desktop, there was no bug-splat error to be seen. I wonder how, and i clicked into the client again.  I saw a quick flicker of my teams borders and champions, but then the screen went black. I exited the game again to see if it now had come up with a bug splat error. Still no bug-splat error to be seen i closed the game completely. I started LoL up again, wrote my password and login, and when the client started up. I immediately clicked the "Reconnect" button. I now sow all the players borders with the champions and percentage in them. I thought "I'll just wait and see what happens" i waited for 30 seconds, and still nothing had moved. None of the players percentages had moved. And i who has a decently good connection with LAN cable coming directly from our router. Was still in deep confusion, with why the game wouldn't launch. I pressed Alt+Esc again and went to check if there was a problem with my GPU or CPU. While checking, i heard the spawning sound of the game, and the sound of the game was playing. I clicked in on the game again, but the game was stuck, it was frozen. My champ standing still in a awkward position, and my timer or fps not moving either. I Exited the game again, and every time i open and close the game, its stuck in a frozen position, with all sound and all  movement off. 

I'm sitting here, asking if anyone can help me. Or if anyone is having the same problems.
I'm sorry for the 4 other players who have to play the game without me. Its a definite loose, and i'm sorry that u will lose that lp.

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having trouble connecting to the game server, with the black screen being an example because it can't download assets.  Bugsplats wouldn't occur in this case because the issue may be with your connection and not game files.  Give our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide a go to troubleshoot this for the fix.  Thanks for the details information here, and hopefully that will get you back in-game!
No no no, i do manage to connect to the servers, but when i connect the screen is Frozen. I have tried restarting my computer, and when i joined a normal game the same bug happened.

Do you have Windows 10?  There's been an issue where the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) has been causing freezing problems for a lot of players.  The update auto-enabled it, and isn't interacting well with league.  Try disabling that for the fix!
i fixed it. An update of windows 10 deleted my graphics cards drivers. The game is working smoothly now
